overview.title: Label Component
overview.description: The <label> element represents a caption for an item in a user interface.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Always use the `for` attribute to link a label with its control.

questions.question: How do you associate a <label> with an <input> element?
answers: Using the `for` attribute matching the input's `id`
questions.answer: Using the `for` attribute matching the input's `id`
